author: ceki
msg: Corrected bug in LoggingEvent that would cause renderedMessage not to be initialized.
Corrected documentation bugs as suggested by Allan Crooks.

author: ceki
msg: Added mistakenly removed debug(Object, Throwable) method.

author: ceki
msg: Changed Category.forcedLog not to render message objects immediately.
Changed LoggingEvent constructor to take a message Object instead of a message String.

author: ceki
msg: Changed LoggingEvent to let Appenders/Layouts to access the raw message object.
The old message field is now called renderedMessage. Also added a new category field.
Appender/Layout needed to be modified to reflect these changes.
